tool_description: An API for getting weather change news from multiple sources
name: Weather Change  Alert
title: Weather Change  Alert

api_list.name: Get specific news about the climate change
api_list.description: Get specific news about the climate change
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://weather-change-alert.p.rapidapi.com/news/bbc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "weather-change-alert.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://weather-change-alert.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "weather-change-alert.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all news articles on climate change
api_list.description: Returns a list of news articles on climate change you can work with the list is ever evolving
